description: Test suite for the 'Agent' class and its interaction with various tools in the 'cohere' model, including synchronous and asynchronous tests, stream handling, multiple and parallel tool calls, and custom tool functions.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the Agent to fetch current stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool calls and intermediate steps.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with the Agent.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls in a single run for different stocks.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single run.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that processes a list of URLs.
